title: Radio Dog
brief_description: In Albion, an anarchist republic of the near future, Felix is listening to Radio Dog as he shaves off his beard. His daydreams gradually form a kaleidoscope portrait of the mongrel city, where doctors serve liquid sunshine on the concrete beach and savage diesel rhythms shake the massive Gun Fetish Club.
